objective: Create a new skill that looks up the weather based on a location input.

examples.task: Search code examples for free weather APIs to gather information on how to retrieve weather data based on a location input.
Read the code in textCompletion.ts using the code_reader skill to understand its structure and concepts.
Write a new skill that combines the concepts from textCompletion.ts and the code examples for free weather APIs to implement weather lookup based on a location input.
Save the newly created skill using the skill_saver skill for future use.
